name: CapRadioNewscast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Use the CapRadio newscast as a Flash Briefing to listen to the latest news. Updated each weekday morning and afternoon, the briefing includes the day’s headlines and stories to keep you up-to-date.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
